puzzle.help: 1. Sukrokuro combines Sudoku, Kropki and Kakuro. 2. Fill in the white cells, one number in each, so that each column and row contains the nubmers 1 through 7 exactly once. 3. Black cells contain clues, which tell you the sum of the number in consecutive cells at its right and downward. 4. A dot separated tiles where the absolute difference between the numbers is 1. 5. If a dot is absent between two cells, the difference between the numbers must be more than 1.
